Welcome to ``pylbd`` Documentation
==============================================================================

Documentation for ``pylbd``.


.. _install:

Install
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``pylbd`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install pylbd

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install --upgrade pylbd
